overview:
I’m a young and motivated entrepreneur, technology expert, and consultant looking to create innovations that have a lasting effect on the world. I wasn’t always an aspiring entrepreneur, but once I found my groove in the world, I never looked back. Driven by my passion to succeed, I spend most of my time working on my start up companies.

I have been influenced by some of the greatest minds in the business industry and continue to use their influences and my experiences to build my career. I am extremely knowledgeable and experienced in everything technology related and can help anyone leverage the web to their advantage. Let me use my experiences and expertise to help guide you or your business with innovative solutions.
